H0.text: what is the song anna kendrick sings in pitch perfect. **You Belong With Me**

H3.text: what is the song anna kendrick sings in pitch perfect. Cups

A4.text: Cups is the only song released and performed by American actress and singer Anna Kendrick on the 2012 extended play (EP) More from Pitch Perfect.

A5.text: The song rose to prominence following its debut in Pitch Perfect (2012).
